Question: Syngular Technology Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Syngular Technology Limited

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Introducing the latest AI-powered smart home security system
- Features advanced facial recognition technology for enhanced security
- Equipped with 24/7 monitoring and real-time alerts for peace of mind
- Offers seamless integration with smart home devices for added convenience
